# [Syncthing](https://syncthing.net/)
I firstly wrote my blogs on Mac, but now I turn to windows desktop.
Therefore, I need a tool to sync my mac blog files with windows desktop.
Then, I can write blogs on windows and sync it to mac, update and deploy the blog.
